Title: An Act Changing the Name of Buendia Avenue in the Municipality of Makati and Pasay City, Both in Metro Manila, to Senator Gil J. Puyat Avenue
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 312
An Act Changing the Name of Buendia Avenue in the Municipality of Makati and Pasay City, Both in Metro Manila, to Senator Gil J. Puyat Avenue
Section 1. The name of Buendia Avenue in the Municipality of Makati and Pasay City, both in Metro Manila, is changed to Senator Gil J. Puyat Avenue.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: November 14, 1982
